DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether simvastatin effective improvement IVF-ICSI outcome Pcos patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Simvastatin Biochemical Parameters Outcome IVF-ICSI Pcos Patients
DOC.detailed_description: simvastatin reduces cardiovascular risk improve hypercholesterolemia , reduce vascular smooth muscle proliferation , ameliorate inflammation , limit theca-interstitial proliferation & decrease steroidogenesis ( production progesterone & testosterone ) .Polycystic ovary syndrome ( pcos ) associate increased cardiovascular risk characterize ovarian theca-interstitial hyperplasia & hyperandrogenism .This study test hypothesis simvastatin improve biochemical parameter & IVF-ICSI outcome Pcos patient .
DOC.criteria: Pcos patient Age < 40 year FSH < 10 IU/L Endometriosis grade 3 & 4 History tubal surgery Hydrosalpinx History mellitis diabetes
